page.title: 15Honeytop Farm, Kidderminster
page.content: {Honeytop Farm}is situated between the Bridgnorth Road and Lowe Lane to the north of Kidderminster. The farm is quite small and has{pigs, sheep}and {horses}which are fed on meal and hay.There is one worker there to help the farmer and his name is Bob.The pigs are sold for{meat}and the sheep for their{wool}and{meat.}On the farm the farmer has two tractors and also two horses, Johnny and Lucky, which are kept in the same field as the sheep. There are about{60 sheep}and about{20 pigs}and there are{5 fields altogether.There is a shelter by the side of the farm cottage for the horses to shelter from the rain, and there is a barn where the hay and potatoes are stored.A cat lives there too. The two tractors are kept in another barn.
